title: Basic html password input test
description: A basic html password input test.

chrome.notes: the previous input that had focus was conveyed again before the new input was conveyed.

results.notes: na because the incorrect value was conveyed

chrome.output: "Enter a fake password, password edit, star password edit, star star, password edit, type in text"
"enter a fake password, password edit, bullet bullet bullet"
in list of form fields as "enter a fake password; edit; bullet bullet bullet"

edge.notes: the previous input that had focus was conveyed again before the new input was conveyed.

results.notes: na because the incorrect value was conveyed

edge.output: "Enter a fake password, password edit, star password edit, star star, password edit, type in text"
"enter a fake password, password edit, bullet bullet bullet"
in list of form fields as "enter a fake password; edit; bullet bullet bullet"

ie.output: "password edit, star star star, enter a fake password, password edit"

results.notes: announced the name when entering the input and automatically switching to forms mode.

ie.output: "enter a fake password, password edit, type in text"
"enter a fake password, password edit, star star star"
in list of form fields as "enter a fake password; edit; star star star"

firefox.output: "<previous input value and role> enter a fake password, password edit, circle bullet, circle bullet, circle bullet, password edit, type in text"
firefox.notes: the previous input that had focus was conveyed again before the new input was conveyed.

results.notes: announced the name when entering the input and automatically switching to forms mode.

firefox.output: "Enter a fake password, password edit, star password edit, star star, password edit, type in text"
"enter a fake password, password edit, circle bullet circle bullet circle bullet"
in list of form fields as "enter a fake password, edit"

edge.output: "enter a fake password, password, scan off"
"enter a fake password, password, dot dot dot selected, scan off"
"enter a fake password, password. press space to edit."

chrome.output: "enter a fake password, edit protected, bullet bullet bullet"
"enter a fake password, edit protected, selected bullet bullet bullet"
"enter a fake password, edit protected, bullet bullet bullet"
in list of form controls as "enter a fake password; edit; protected; bullet bullet bullet"

edge.output: "enter a fake password, edit protected, bullet bullet bullet"
"enter a fake password, edit protected, selected bullet bullet bullet"
"enter a fake password, edit protected, bullet bullet bullet"
in list of form controls as "enter a fake password; edit; protected; bullet bullet bullet"

firefox.output: "clickable, enter a fake password, edit protected"
"enter a fake password, edit protected, selected"
in list of form controls as "enter a fake password; edit; protected; bullet bullet bullet"

results.notes: value is displayed in speech viewer and element list, but not voiced by NVDA
value is displayed in speech viewer and element list, but not voiced by NVDA
value is displayed in speech viewer and element list, but not voiced by NVDA
value is displayed in speech viewer and element list, but not voiced by NVDA

and_chr.output: "password, 3 characters, edit box, enter a fake password"
"password, 3 characters, edit box, enter a fake password"
input was flagged with a number

ios_saf.output: "enter a fake password, 3 characters, secure text field"

safari.output: "3 characters, enter a fake password, secure edit text, with autofill menu"
"3 characters, enter a fake password, secure edit text, with autofill menu"
"3 characters, enter a fake password, secure edit text"
in list of form controls as "3 characters enter a fake password secure edit text"

firefox.output: "enter a fake password, password text, bullet bullet bullet"
"enter a fake password, password text, bullet bullet bullet, selected"
"enter a fake password, password text, bullet bullet bullet"
in list of form controls as "enter a fake password; password text; bullet bullet bullet"

results.notes: commands were only sometimes recognized. Had to use commands to control the on-screen keyboard.

history.message: Added Narrator results for NVDA and JAWS, updated NVDA+Chrome results.
